Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Team must have between 5 and 9 members

Name: Budget Ceiling
Description: Project budget must not exceed allocated amount

Name: Skill Coverage
Description: Every team must include required skills

Name: Availability Window
Description: Employees must be available for sprint start

Name: Release Date Target
Description: Release must occur by planned date

Name: Backlog Completeness
Description: Product Backlog must contain all approved items

Name: Epic Size Cap
Description: Epic estimated effort must not exceed threshold

Name: Sprint Goal Defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: Max Daily Meetings
Description: Limit daily scrum meetings per team

Name: Blocker Resolution Window
Description: Blockers must be resolved within 48 hours
